3: I found... Mother... She's with Jane... They're... okay... Thank God...
The troops! The troops are here!
In the back! The back! A group of Corrupted! There's one in the middle! Oh god, what do we do?!
Everyone, stand back!
Take aim, ready to fire!
Nanami!
Don't shoot! Nanami, she's a... good child...
She's a mechanoid! If a mechanoid is infected—
No! She won't! She's fighting for us... Can't you see?
Nanami!
No sir! Turn back!
Daddy... Mommy... Why am I... a machine...?
Nanami... Sorry...
We've lied to you...
You... were a subject in... a machine consciousness experiment...
We treated you like a human, nurturing you so you'd grow into humans like us...
But then... why can Nanami... grow...
'Won't grow tall if you don't sleep on time,' remember?
I see... A... Ahaha...
Nanami... Your father and mother love you from the bottom of our hearts...
The time we spent together was real, Nanami... We are not a fake family.
It's okay, I know...
Urgh—
Fire! Shoot them! They're coming! They're coming!
Evacuate the crowd! There's still one last flight in the nearby airport!
Mommy, daddy, Jane, you should leave!
Prepare to fire!
Stop! You all stop!
We cannot take any potential risks!
At least... at least... just wait a little more... please...
...She can continue fighting, but we will not allow her to come near. And if she becomes a Corrupted, we will fire at her indiscriminately.
It's okay, mommy... I... I'll continue fighting the Corrupted... and protect everyone...
But if I become a Corrupted... I wouldn't want myself hurting you all...
Goodbye, Jane...
Goodbye, Mommy, Daddy. So long, and thanks for all the good times...
